Package controller

Class StandardGameController

java.lang.Object
controller.StandardGameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameController, LobbyController, Remote
public class StandardGameController extends Object implements GameController, LobbyController
This is a combined implementation of a LobbyController and a GameController

The game rules implemented follow the standard rules

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final Game
    game
    The model of the game this controller is interacting with
    private final Consumer<? super LobbyController>
    gameClosedCallback
    Consumer called after the game has been definitely closed.
    private final TimedLock<Boolean>
    lobbyLock
    The timed lock used by lobby controller to control leave and join flow
    private final Map<ClientInterface,Map<Observable,Observer>>
    observerAssociation
    Map of association between a client and all the observers it is attached to, observers are also associated with the observable they are attached to.
    private final Map<User,String>
    playerAssociation
    Map of association between a user reference on the server and its playerID into game model
    private final Map<ClientInterface,User>
    userAssociation
    Map of association between a client and its user reference on the server

  • Field Details

    • game

      private final Game game
      The model of the game this controller is interacting with

    • userAssociation

      private final Map<ClientInterface,User> userAssociation
      Map of association between a client and its user reference on the server

    • playerAssociation

      private final Map<User,String> playerAssociation
      Map of association between a user reference on the server and its playerID into game model

    • observerAssociation

      private final Map<ClientInterface,Map<Observable,Observer>> observerAssociation
      Map of association between a client and all the observers it is attached to, observers are also associated with the observable they are attached to. This object is mainly used when a client needs to be detached from the game

    • gameClosedCallback

      private final Consumer<? super LobbyController> gameClosedCallback
      Consumer called after the game has been definitely closed. This allows to notify who generated this instance that this game controller is no longer useful

    • lobbyLock

      private final TimedLock<Boolean> lobbyLock
      The timed lock used by lobby controller to control leave and join flow

  • Constructor Details

    • StandardGameController

      public StandardGameController(Game game, Consumer<? super LobbyController> gameClosedCallback)
      This constructor builds an instance that uses the given game model and gameClosed callback, it is initialized with empty user, player and observer association
      Parameters:
      game - The game model that the game controller need to use
      gameClosedCallback - The gameClosed callback

  • Method Details

    • joinPlayer

      public void joinPlayer(ClientInterface newClient, User newUser, String playerId) throws GameAccessDeniedException
      This method allows a client to join the lobby and to be attached to the Game
      Specified by:
      joinPlayer in interface LobbyController
      Parameters:
      newClient - The client that needs to be attached to the game
      newUser - The user reference of the client into the server
      playerId - The new player ID
      Throws:
      GameAccessDeniedException - if the game is already ended or the player id already exists or the matchmaking is closed

      PlayerNotExistsException - if the player does not exists

      shelf - The player shelf the move is referred

      Throws:

      Returns:
